author: bridge-bot
content:
<KolbyML> @khovratovich https://github.com/KolbyML/compile-hashsig-to-risc0

hashsig pulls in getrandom from Plonky3's crate's, I guess we can submit a issue upstream

and use 

```
[target.'cfg(target_os = "zkvm")']
rustflags = ["--cfg", "getrandom_backend=\"custom\""]```

^ for the time being locally, which would fix the issue for us specifically, in `.cargo/config` which was identified by @shariqnaiyer/@junsong_eth 

But it would nice for hashsig to have getrandom as optional, or have Plonky3 resolve the issue upstream

I asked @shariqnaiyer to make issues for this
